projects.title: AI Agent Form Assistant & Chatbot
projects.shortDescription: An intelligent AI agent that automatically fills form fields while providing conversational assistance through an integrated chatbot interface.
projects.fullDescription: Developed a production-ready AI agent system that combines automated form filling with conversational AI capabilities. The system uses LLM-powered intelligence to understand user context, extract relevant information, and populate form fields while maintaining a natural conversation flow for clarifications and assistance.
features: Intelligent form field auto-population using LLM context understanding
Dual-mode operation: automated filling and conversational chatbot
Real-time streaming responses with Server-Sent Events (SSE)
Structured output validation using tool calling mechanisms
Context-aware field suggestions and error correction
API request optimization for efficient data transmission
Support for complex nested form structures

improvements: Reduced form filling time by 70% on average

challenges.problem: SSE connection timeouts during long-running LLM inference
challenges.solution: Implemented adaptive timeout settings and connection retry logic with exponential backoff

challenges.problem: Ensuring structured JSON output from LLM for form field mapping
challenges.solution: Leveraged tool calling mechanism to enforce schema validation and guarantee structured responses

challenges.problem: Efficient data transmission between frontend and LLM API
challenges.solution: Optimized API request parameters using GET for queries and POST body for complex form data
